body_html:
Hmm, I'm getting this error?

ERROR: T:/src/github/tensorflow/WORKSPACE:41:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
	File "T:/src/github/tensorflow/WORKSPACE", line 41
		tf_workspace()
	File "T:/src/github/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 72, in tf_workspace
		check_bazel_version_at_least("0.10.0")
	File "T:/src/github/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 62, in check_bazel_version_at_least
		fail("\nCurrent Bazel version is {}, ...))

Current Bazel version is 0.9.0, expected at least 0.10.0

Seems like we forget to upgrade Bazel version on Kokoro Windows machines? @yifeif

body:
Hmm, I'm getting this error?
```
ERROR: T:/src/github/tensorflow/WORKSPACE:41:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
	File "T:/src/github/tensorflow/WORKSPACE", line 41
		tf_workspace()
	File "T:/src/github/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 72, in tf_workspace
		check_bazel_version_at_least("0.10.0")
	File "T:/src/github/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 62, in check_bazel_version_at_least
		fail("\nCurrent Bazel version is {}, ...))

Current Bazel version is 0.9.0, expected at least 0.10.0
```
Seems like we forget to upgrade Bazel version on Kokoro Windows machines? @yifeif
